unit.utterance: Yek ruz sobh, sobhe zud, vaqte xorus xān moqei ke sedāye xorus miyāmad
unit.utterance_translation: One morning, one early morning, when the rooster was crowing

unit.utterance: marde bāqbān az deraxt bālā raft ke golābihā rā bečinad
unit.utterance_translation: the gardner climbed up the tree to pick pears

unit.utterance: yek seri golābi čid āvard pāyin
unit.utterance_translation: he picked some pears and brought them down

unit.utterance: gozāšt rixt tuye sabad čand tāyaš rā bā dastmal gardanaš pāk kard
unit.utterance_translation: put them in the basket, cleaned a few with his scarf

unit.utterance: bad dobāre az nardebān raft bālā ke baqiyeaš rā bečinad
unit.utterance_translation: then again he climbed up the ladder to pick the pears again

unit.utterance: Dar heyne inke dāšt mičid yek marde javāni bā yek boz āmad rad šod
unit.utterance_translation: while picking, a young man came with his goat, he crossed the gardner over

unit.utterance: bad yek pesare kučaki bā dočarxe dāšt rad mišod
unit.utterance_translation: then a little boy on the bike was passing

unit.utterance: ke āmad rad bešavad sabadhāye golābi rā ke did vasvase šod az dočarxe piyāde šod
unit.utterance_translation: While crossing, he saw the pear baskets and got tempted so he got off the bike

unit.utterance: va āmad man fekr kardam aval momken ast yeki do tā bardārad ke bexāhad boxorad bad didam na kolle sabad rā, yeki az se sabad rā bardāšt
unit.utterance_translation: and came, I thought that he might take one or two pears to eat, but then I saw he took the whole basket, one of the baskets

unit.utterance: gozāšt ruye dočarxeaš az sabadhāye xeyli por rā va dar haghighat dozdidaš
unit.utterance_translation: he put it on his bike, one of the full baskets, actually he stole it.

unit.utterance: Vaqti ke dāšt miraft yavāšaki in kār rā kard marde bāqbān ruye nardebān vasate šāxo barge deraxt dāšt golābi mičid nadid
unit.utterance_translation: while he was going away, he did it secretly, the gardner was still on top of the ladder picking the pears, so he couldn't see the scene

unit.utterance: motevajeh našod
unit.utterance_translation: he didn't notice anything

unit.utterance: vaqti pesar dāšt ba sabade golābi bā dočarxe miraft
unit.utterance_translation: when the little boy was leaving with the basket on his bike

unit.utterance: yek pesare kučake digar ba dočarxe az baqaleš rad šod
unit.utterance_translation: another little boy on a bike passed him

unit.utterance: havāsaš part šod
unit.utterance_translation: he got distracted

unit.utterance: pesare kučak kolāhaš rā bād bord va saraš rā bargardānd kolāhaš rā bād bord havāsaš part šod va bā dočarxe oftād zamin
unit.utterance_translation: the wind blew off the boy's hat, he turned back, he got distracted and fell down

unit.utterance: sabade golābihā ham oftād va tamāme golābiha ham paxše zamin šod
unit.utterance_translation: the basket fell off the bike too, and all the pears spilled out

unit.utterance: va vaqti in etefāq oftād čand tā pesare kučake digar šāhede in manzare budand
unit.utterance_translation: when that happend, a few boys were watching the scene

unit.utterance: ān kenār istāde budand
unit.utterance_translation: they were standing near the place

unit.utterance: va āmadand be in pesar komak kardand dočarxeaš rā boland kardand golābihā rā jam kardand tuye sabad rixtand
unit.utterance_translation: and they came to help the boy, gathered up the pears and put them in the basket

unit.utterance: lebāshāye pesar rā tekāndand pesar engār pāyaš zaxm šode bud
unit.utterance_translation: they dusted the boy's clothes, it seemed that his foot was injured

unit.utterance: vali beheš komak kardand dobāre savāre dočarxe šavad sabadaš rā gozāštand ruye dočarxe ke dobāre rāh bioftad
unit.utterance_translation: but they helped him to get on his bike again, put the basket on the bike and go

unit.utterance: va jolotar ke raftand va pesar ke rāh oftād
unit.utterance_translation: they went a bit farther and the boy had already left

unit.utterance: inhā, pesar bačehā jolotar ke āmadand kolāhe pesare rā peydā kardand
unit.utterance_translation: they, the boys came farther, and found the little boy's hat

unit.utterance: va beheš raftand dādand va dar ezāyaš čand tā golābi be onvāne tašakor gereftand
unit.utterance_translation: they gave it back to him and in return they received a few pears

unit.utterance: se tā golābi dar haqiqat čon se nafar budand
unit.utterance_translation: three pears actually, because they were three

unit.utterance: va šoru kardand xordane golābihā dar eyne hāl, marde bāqbān az deraxt āmad pāyin
unit.utterance_translation: then they started eating them, at the same time the gardner climbed down the tree

unit.utterance: va sabadhāyaš rā šemord va did yekišān kam ast
unit.utterance_translation: and counted his baskets and found out that one of them is not there

unit.utterance: va taajob kard ke če etefāqi oftāde va če juri šode ke dozdide šode yā mānde bud ke če etefāqi oftāde ke in se tā bače āmadand dar hāle gāz zadane golābi az kenāraš rad šodand
unit.utterance_translation: he got surprised and while he was wondering what had happend to the basket, the three boys arrived eating the pears, and passed the man

unit.utterance: va mard ham ba taajob behešān negāh mikard ke če etefāqi oftāde va āyā inhā hamān golābihā hastand golābihāye dozdide šodeye mard hastand kojā mitavānand bāšand in bačehā dozdidand yā či šode
unit.utterance_translation: and the man was looking at them surprisingly and wondering what had happend to the basket, whether these pears are the stolen pears of his, where they could be, whether these boys stole the basket, or what happend.
